item.description:
Every month Loving Hut holds a vegan buffet as a fundraiser for VegWorcester.com It's only 10 bucks for all you can eat. So good! 10% of the day's proceeds are donated to VegWorcester. It will run from noon to 7pm, enjoy!!

This month we are going to celebrate the one year anniversary of the first Loving Hut buffet (back then it was called Buddha Hut!). Loving Hut will be serving some special items that are not normally featured on the menu. VegWorcester will be giving them a plaque to show how thankful we are to have their monthly support.

There will be lots of vegan cupcakes and a raffle too. Sweeeet

This is not one to miss!
item.name: Celebrate 1 year of Loving Hut buffets!!
